verses.plain: Children, obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right.

tokens.t: Children, obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right.

verses.plain: Honour thy father and mother; (which is the first commandment with promise;)

tokens.t: Honour thy father and mother; (which is the first commandment with promise;)

verses.plain: That it may be well with thee, and thou mayest live long on the earth.

tokens.t: That it may be well with thee, and thou mayest live long on the earth.

verses.plain: And, ye fathers, provoke not your children to wrath: but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.

tokens.t: And, ye fathers, provoke not your children to wrath: but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.

verses.plain: Servants, be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh, with fear and trembling, in singleness of your heart, as unto Christ;

tokens.t: Servants, be obedient to them that are
masters according to the flesh, with fear and trembling, in singleness of your heart, as unto Christ;

verses.plain: Not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but as the servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart;

tokens.t: Not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but as the servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart;

verses.plain: With good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men:

tokens.t: With good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men:

verses.plain: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth, the same shall he receive of the Lord, whether he be bond or free.

tokens.t: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth, the same shall he receive of the Lord, whether
bond or free.

verses.plain: And, ye masters, do the same things unto them, forbearing threatening: knowing that your Master also is in heaven; neither is there respect of persons with him.

tokens.t: And, ye masters, do the same things unto them, forbearing threatening: knowing that your Master also is in heaven; neither is there respect of persons with him.

verses.plain: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.

tokens.t: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.

verses.plain: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.

tokens.t: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.

verses.plain: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places.

tokens.t: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high

verses.plain: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.

tokens.t: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.

verses.plain: Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness;

tokens.t: Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness;

verses.plain: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace;

tokens.t: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace;

verses.plain: Above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked.

tokens.t: Above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked.

verses.plain: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:

tokens.t: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:

verses.plain: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;

tokens.t: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;

verses.plain: And for me, that utterance may be given unto me, that I may open my mouth boldly, to make known the mystery of the gospel,

tokens.t: And for me, that utterance may be given unto me, that I may open my mouth boldly, to make known the mystery of the gospel,

verses.plain: For which I am an ambassador in bonds: that therein I may speak boldly, as I ought to speak.

tokens.t: For which I am an ambassador in bonds: that therein I may speak boldly, as I ought to speak.

verses.plain: But that ye also may know my affairs, and how I do, Tychicus, a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord, shall make known to you all things:

tokens.t: But that ye also may know my affairs,
how I do, Tychicus, a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord, shall make known to you all things:

verses.plain: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that ye might know our affairs, and that he might comfort your hearts.

tokens.t: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that ye might know our affairs, and
he might comfort your hearts.

verses.plain: Peace be to the brethren, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

tokens.t: Peace
to the brethren, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.plain: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity. Amen.

tokens.t: Grace
with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity. Amen.
